## Importar librerias
```{r setup, cache = TRUE}
library(twitteR)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

## Definir llaves y realizar el setup para obtener informacion del app
```{r setup, cache = TRUE}
consumer_key <- ""
consumer_secret <- ""
access_token <- ""
access_secret <- ""
setup_twitter_oauth(consumer_key, consumer_secret, access_token, access_secret)
```

## Obtener tweets, traspasarlo a DF y exportarlo a un .csv
```{r setup, cache = TRUE}
tw <- twitteR::searchTwitter('#TheRiseofSkywalker', n = 1e4, since = '2019-10-20', retryOnRateLimit = 1e3)
df <- twitteR::twListToDF(tw)
df %>% head() %>% View()
write_csv(df,"tweetsRoS.csv")
```
